tag_list: robert-slaughter, hinttech, ecm, wcm, mobile-web, mobile-apps, html5, javascript, css3, responsive-design
overview:
Senior Business Development and Sales Executive

Robert has more than 15 years experience developing strategic relationships with global technology partners such as Akamai, SapientNitro, Microsoft, SDL Tridion, SAP, Adobe, Oracle, Razorfish/Digitas and Sitecore.

In addition to his partner initiatives, Robert has directed implementation of corporate IT projects for such companies as L’Oreal, AT&T, Walmart, Sony PE, Merck, Whirlpool, NBC Universal, Coca-Cola, AEXP and MetLife.

Specialties • WCMS & ECM o Tridion, Sitecore, Drupal, Sharepoint • Software Development o Java/.NET • Mobile Strategy • Mobile Web/Native/Hybrid Apps o HTML5, Javascript, CSS, iOS, Android, jQuery, Sencha, Netbiscuits, RWD • Cloud Computing/Hosting • SaaS and PaaS • Commerce/Customer Care Platform
